name: Uncaring
description:
Uncaring is a Stealth puzzle game where you place an individual trying to steal life saving medicine from the local government pharmacy. Unable to really fight you use the tech available to you to create noises that will draw attention away from you. Traverse the levels, steal that life saving medication, and confuse some guards. Remember that you cannot fight only run so use all the tools available to you...or the one tool available to you

Controls
WASD Movement
Click on the devices to cause them to make sound
Space to interact with the pill case

Note: Most noise making devices can only be used once before they are either turned off or rendered unusable. So use them wisely
